title: New CBC slabserif
content:
CBC Newsworld has been renamed CBC News Network. Adieu, Frutiger!

But which of the myriad barely-differentiable slabserifs is in use here?

- [Official logo site](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026161149/http:/www.cbc.ca/imagegallery/ "CBC Image Gallery")
- [Quick cameraphone snapshot](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026161149/http:/johnbowman.posterous.com/bye-bye-newsworld-hello-cbc-news-network-cbcn "Image at Posterous")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [CBC NN body\_launchNN09 orig.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091026161149/http:/typophile.com/files/CBC%20NN%20body_launchNN09%20orig.jpg) | 36.47 KB |
author: joeclark

comments.content: You had a little problem with your link so I fixed it.

Well spotted, Antonio! And terribly well hung too is this Stag.

—  
Joe Clark
